name: Kuku Kube Pro
description:
This Puzzle game is designed to evaluate the quality of your color vision.

Find the difference and TAP, share your result with your friends. Scores between 29 to 31 in 60 seconds are normal, and anything above is great!!!

**Try to pass Level 1 (50 points) to play a higher difficulty level!
**You can also use 'Help feature' by triple tapping on background view or tap Hint button.
